commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: There's something I want everyone to help me out with.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: You need help with something? Sure, if it's something we can handle.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I want you to follow the instructions written on this piece of paper and go to the rooftop.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Instructions? Is this some kind of experiment?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: You could call it an experiment, maybe? I'm testing an attraction to be used in an amusement park event.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: What?! Why are you involved in something like that?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: A relative of mine asked me to do it. They want my help so they can get feedback from lots of people.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: So that's what's behind all of this. It does sound kinda fun to be able to experience an amusement park attraction before anyone else does, though!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: And that means we get to enjoy it before anyone else does, right? That's a huge plus!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Hehe, how exciting! But wouldn't it be better to have more people around if that's what you're doing? Want me to ask Honoka and the others?

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: I wanna invite Hanamaru and Yoshiko as well if you're gonna ask them.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Aww, not fair! I wanna ask the Prez to come as well!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Um... This attraction involves a group of five people trying to reach the goal at the end. So is it okay if I just ask everyone here today?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: It's ready for testing, but they want to improve it based on everyone's reactions. So I'll need even more people for the next test.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Very well. If that is what you require, then we will assist you with your test today.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Also, they said they'd invite me to the grand opening of the attraction at the amusement park when it's ready, so I'll invite everyone who helped out then.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Yay! You're always so generous, Rinako!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: It's only natural to want to share the fun. I can't wait to go to the grand opening as well!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Right then, shall we begin? Please show me the piece of paper.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Here you go.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: What does it say?

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: It shows the route towards the roof and the checkpoints along the way.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Is it sort of like orienteering? I'm glad the instructions aren't complicated.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Can I have a look?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Mm-hmm. Uh-huh. I'm a student at this school, so this should be a cinch with me around! Come on everyone, I'll show you the way!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: I'm glad we have you here, since this school is so big.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Hehe! I never get lost and I know all the shortcuts so you'll be fine if you just stick by me, Ruby!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: No shortcuts allowed.
